means: 强迫，使不得不( compel的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: Her eyes were her best feature, wide-set and compelling.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的眼睛是她五官中长得最好的，大而迷人。

sentence.Network_en: His prose is always lucid and compelling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的散文素来简洁、有力。

sentence.Network_en: Her latest book makes compelling reading.
sentence.Network_cn: 她新出的书读起来扣人心弦。

compelling中文 ... compellent 强制性的 compelling 强制的 compend 手册概要.
背单词_青芷之露吧_百度贴吧 ... 32 committed 守信的 33 compelling 令人信服的 34 concerning 关于.
compel 强迫compelling 激发兴趣的compendious 扼要的

list.abs: 更糟糕的是，他们觉得提出这些问题是理所应当（feel compelled）的。许多学生在毕业前夕的未来探索中跟我说，他们感受到来自同 …

翻译硕士经典素材... ... 不可抗力 force majeure 不可推卸的责任 compelling obligation 不可再生资源 non-renewable resources.
被_百度百科 ... 被侵略者[ victim of aggression] 被迫[ be compelled;be forced;be constrained] 被褥[ bedding;bedclothes].

entry.tran: 令人信服的;有说服力的
entry.def: A compelling argument or reason is one that convinces you that something is true or that something should be done.

example.ex: Factual and forensic evidence makes a suicide verdict the most compelling answer to the mystery of his death...
example.tran: 事实证据和法庭证据使得自杀成为解开他死因之谜的最令人信服的答案。

example.ex: My second and more compelling reason for going to Dearborn was to see the Henry Ford Museum.
example.tran: 我去迪尔伯恩的第二个原因，也是更令人信服的原因,是为了参观亨利·福特博物馆。

entry.tran: 非常有趣的;很有吸引力的
entry.def: If you describe something such as a film or book, or someone's appearance, as compelling, you mean you want to keep looking at it or reading it because you find it so interesting.

example.tran: 有可怕的暴力镜头但却引人入胜的电影

example.ex: Her eyes were her best feature, wide-set and compelling.
example.tran: 她的眼睛是她五官中长得最好的，大而迷人。

means.word_mean: 2. tending to persuade by forcefulness of argument;

auth_sentence.content: One of the most compelling examples is Jungle Lullaby.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the most compelling examples is Jungle Lullaby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the most compelling examples is Jungle Lullaby.

auth_sentence.content: The parallels with today's carbon tax are compelling.
auth_sentence.res_content: The parallels with today's carbon tax are compelling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The parallels with today's carbon tax are compelling.

auth_sentence.content: This is partly what made the topic so compelling.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is partly what made the topic so compelling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is partly what made the topic so compelling.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引起兴趣的,引人注目的;强制的, 强迫的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compel[v.强迫,迫使]+ing表形容词→compelling强迫的→[某事或物]迫使其注意→引人注目的
com共同+pel驱动,推→一起推→强迫

means.word_mean: 引人入胜的;扣人心弦的

sentences.en: She found his story so compelling that she had forgotten to drink wine.
sentences.cn: 他的故事使她听得入神,以至她忘记喝酒了。

means.word_mean: 非常强烈的;不可抗拒的

sentences.cn: 他的眼睛有一种奇特的吸引力。

sentences.en: I have no compelling reasons to refuse.
sentences.cn: 我没有驱使我拒绝的理由。

means.word_mean: 令人信服的，有说服力的

sentences.en: The case for greater nationalization is compelling.
sentences.cn: 主张进一步国有化的理由是令人信服的。

sentences.en: There is a compelling logic to his main theory.
sentences.cn: 他的主要理论蕴含令人信服的逻辑推理。

sentences.en: There is no logically compelling argument to support their claims.
sentences.cn: 没有任何逻辑上有说服力的论据来支持他们的主张。
